definition: the act of meting out justice according to the law
details:
noun
- the act of meting out justice according to the law
= synonyms: judicature
- the act of administering medication
= synonyms: giving medication
- the act of governing
= synonyms: governing, government, governance, government activity
- a method of tending to or managing the affairs of a some group of people (especially the group's business affairs)
= synonyms: disposal
- the persons or committees or departments etc., who make up a body for the purpose of administering something
= example: the persons or committees or departments etc., who make up a body for the purpose of administering something
= synonyms: establishment
- the tenure of a president
= example: the tenure of a president
= synonyms: presidency
